title: Maya the Bee: Urodzinowa Surprise [PL] [ISO] [CD] [ALADYN1111]
description:
Tivola (producer) 
Tivola (editor) 
CD Projekt (genre) 
Family / Adventure 
May 15, 2002 (worldwide release date) 
May 15, 2002 (the date of issue in Poland) 


requirements: Pentium II 300 MHz, 64 MB RAM 
Another virtual game, was against the background of the popular animated series and 
dedicated to the youngest audience. This time we participate in the preparation of the 
anniversary of adoption of the title character. 
Maya the Bee: Urodzinowa Surprise is another (after Maya the Bee: Great 
Storm) a virtual game, created on the canvas of the popular animated series and 
dedicated to the youngest recipients (adults should also be 
satisfied with the possibility of collective play with their children). This time 
accompany trutniowi Gucio, Konikowie polnemu Philip and other friends in 
preparations for the anniversary of adoption of the title character. 

The path to the ultimate goal of several different sets of tasks - from 
juggling, by finding the hidden insects and feeding of young people 
ula, and ending with the air races. Only the completion of that phase 
the game gives you the right move to the next section. The authors have implemented 
many educational motives - the user practices and improving memory 
the ability of logical thinking and clear facts. In addition, attention - 
the following elements: 


Professional Polish language version. 
Attractive visual binding. 
Nice characters. 
Interesting topic. 
The presence of a series of humorous threads 
Use pieces of television cartoons.

[PL]
